## NFTDrop.getAllClaimed() method

Get the metadata for all the claimed NFTs on this drop

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllClaimed(): Promise<NFTMetadata[]>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[NFTMetadata](./solana.nftmetadata.md)\[\]&gt;

metadata for all claimed NFTs

## Example


```jsx
const nfts = await program.getAllClaimed();
```
